topic.title: Patient Condition Change At Destination Observation - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.37"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10694)/@code="67551-2" EMS patient condition change at destination (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10693)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10695), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PatientConditionChange 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.59 STATIC (CONF:10696)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.19
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10694)/@code="67551-2" EMS patient condition change at destination (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10693)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10695), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PatientConditionChange 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.59 STATIC (CONF:10696)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.19

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.37"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="542165238"/> <code code="67551-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS patient condition change at destination"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="457110615"/> </observation>

p.ph: Patient Condition Change At Destination Observation
